text: and I heard the gunshots I didn't think
they were gunshots oh I thought somebody
was working on their house I didn't know
anybody had died yet I just know that
they had said there was a random
shooting at the church and all I could
think about was my daughter goes to that
church music she goes with the neighbors
she was a she homeschooled her kids as
far as I knew
he worked in Floresville either at the
Sheriff's Department or somewhere I'm
not sure but I know he worked somewhere
up there and the you know in the office
I just noticed that people were coming
over to the house over here and I don't
know what was going on because all I
heard was about the shooting they say a
bunch of different names you know we
don't know really who's been killed or
not
so then she goes over to the fence and
she's waiting and I said what are you
doing and she says I'm just looking just
looking to see if anybody's outside what
I tell my kid you know they're almost
the same ages you know they played
together all the time she'd spent a
night over there she knows how to get on
the phone better than I can so she knows
what's going on and I really didn't want
to say anything and she's asking me mom
tell me I said I can't tell you I don't
know for sure I went to her phone this
morning and she was texting somebody and
she was saying her best friend got
killed
it's sad that something like this
happened in this little bitty town but
it hit too close to home now
that's my neighbors you know like our
